snippet.title: DOUBLE DRAGON & Kunio-kun Retro Brawler Bundle Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
DOUBLE DRAGON & Kunio-kun Retro Brawler Bundle Available Now!
Nintendo Switch: bit.ly/3bApnCq
PlayStation 4: bit.ly/2uSfa44

DOUBLE DRAGON & Kunio-kun Retro Brawler Bundle, is a huge collection of cool, legendary beat’em up games from the arcade and classic consoles for PlayStation®4, and Nintendo Switch™. 

This collection includes 18 titles from the DOUBLE DRAGON and Kunio-kun series which bring back you to old days with modern conveniences such as online play, missions, save states , and the ability to switch between the original or “Quality Up” versions that fix bugs and adjust the game balance to most of the games. Experience 18 classic games, 11 of which have never been localized into English. 

DOUBLE DRAGON series 
DOUBLE DRAGON (1987)
DOUBLE DRAGON II: The Revenge (1988)
DOUBLE DRAGON III: The Sacred Stones (1990)

Kunio-kun series 
Renegade (1986)
Super Dodge Ball (1988)
River City Ransom (1989)
Crash'n the Boys Street Challenge (1992)

Kunio-kun series (Published only in Japan, first time localized in NA)
Nekketsu Renegade Kunio-kun (1987)
Nekketsu High School Dodgeball Club (1987)
Downtown Nekketsu Story (1989)
Nekketsu High School Dodgeball Club - Soccer Story (1990)
Downtown Nekketsu March Super-Awesome Field Day! (1990)
Downtown Special Kunio-kun's Historical Period Drama! (1991)
Go-Go! Nekketsu Hockey Club Slip-and-Slide Madness (1992)
Surprise! Nekketsu New Records! The Distant Gold Medal (1992)
Nekketsu Fighting Legend (1992)
Kunio-kun's Nekketsu Soccer League (1993)
Nekketsu! Street Basketball All-Out Dunk Heroes (1993)

For more information visit the official game page:
http://bit.ly/2RWLBH8
__________
Follow Arc System Works America, Inc.
https://facebook.com/arcsystemworksu
https://twitter.com/arcsystemworksu
https://instagram.com/arcsystemworksu
https://twitch.tv/arcsystemworksu
